# **ELECTRIC CHARGE \++**

An OpenGL over C++ electric charge simulation program made as a Differential Equations demonstration, using mainly GLFW, GLAD, GLM and Freetype2.

## Capabilities

* Add positive and negative charges.  
* Move the added charges by click and dragging.  
* Change the charge values with the mouse scroll wheel.  
* Clear all the charges.

![][image1]
